item.title: Mimi add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Try a little harder to be a little better." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Mimi add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Catherine Clark
item.description: "I hate when I'm an idiot and I don't know it. I like to be aware of my idiocy, to really revel in it, take pictures." -- Catherine Clark

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Julia Child
item.description: "If you're afraid of butter, use cream." -- Julia Child

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Julia Child
item.description: "It's so beautifully arranged on the plate - you know someone's fingers have been all over it." -- Julia Child

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Julia Child
item.description: "The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook." -- Julia Child

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Robin McKinley
item.description: "Cannot a Beast be tamed?" -- Robin McKinley

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Robin McKinley
